trans-unit.source: PrestaShop Design allows you to be more autonomous in the complete and advanced customization of your PrestaShop store.
trans-unit.target: PrestaShop Design allows you to be more autonomous in the complete and advanced customization of your PrestaShop store.

trans-unit.source: You are about to import a logo in svg format. This format being incompatible with the email and invoice logos, these will retain the current logo.
trans-unit.target: You are about to import a logo in svg format. This format being incompatible with the email and invoice logos, these will retain the current logo.

trans-unit.source: The theme %theme% has been set as active theme.
trans-unit.target: The theme %theme% has been set as active theme.

trans-unit.source: The theme %theme% cannot be deleted because it's the default Prestashop theme.
trans-unit.target: The theme %theme% cannot be deleted because it's the default Prestashop theme.

trans-unit.source: Please select correct theme's import source.
trans-unit.target: Please select correct theme's import source.

trans-unit.source: File does not exist or bad type uploaded.
trans-unit.target: File does not exist or bad type uploaded.

trans-unit.source: There is already a theme %theme_name% in your themes folder. Remove it if you want to continue.
trans-unit.target: There is already a theme %theme_name% in your themes folder. Remove it if you want to continue.

trans-unit.source: Allowed file size exceeded for uploaded theme.
trans-unit.target: Allowed file size exceeded for uploaded theme.

trans-unit.source: The file type is invalid. Allowed file type is .zip.
trans-unit.target: The file type is invalid. Allowed file type is .zip.

trans-unit.source: Unknown error occurred. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Unknown error occurred. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: Themes can only be imported in single store context.
trans-unit.target: Themes can only be imported in single store context.

trans-unit.source: The import of your theme failed. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: The import of your theme failed. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: Default colors can only be customized for Classic theme.
trans-unit.target: Default colors can only be customized for Classic theme.

trans-unit.source: The color palette "%name%" has been edited.
trans-unit.target: The color palette "%name%" has been edited.

trans-unit.source: The color palette "%name%" has been added.
trans-unit.target: The color palette "%name%" has been added.

trans-unit.source: The color palette "%name%" has been activated successfully.
trans-unit.target: The color palette "%name%" has been activated successfully.

trans-unit.source: Enabling theme failed. Please use "Theme" tab to enable theme.
trans-unit.target: Enabling theme failed. Please use "Theme" tab to enable theme.

trans-unit.source: The name of the color palette can't be empty.
trans-unit.target: The name of the color palette can't be empty.

trans-unit.source: The buttons and links color of the color palette can't be empty.
trans-unit.target: The buttons and links color of the color palette can't be empty.

trans-unit.source: The discount elements color of the color palette can't be empty.
trans-unit.target: The discount elements color of the color palette can't be empty.

trans-unit.source: The text color of the color palette can't be empty.
trans-unit.target: The text color of the color palette can't be empty.

trans-unit.source: The buttons and links color is not a valid hexadecimal code. Expected format looks like "#000000".
trans-unit.target: The buttons and links color is not a valid hexadecimal code. Expected format looks like "#000000".

trans-unit.source: The discount elements color is not a valid hexadecimal code. Expected format looks like "#000000".
trans-unit.target: The discount elements color is not a valid hexadecimal code. Expected format looks like "#000000".

trans-unit.source: The text color is not a valid hexadecimal code. Expected format looks like "#000000".
trans-unit.target: The text color is not a valid hexadecimal code. Expected format looks like "#000000".

trans-unit.source: Connection with database to update new color palette failed. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Connection with database to update new color palette failed. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: File in module does not exist or not writable. Please check user permissions in server
trans-unit.target: File in module does not exist or not writable. Please check user permissions in server

trans-unit.source: Process of creating new styles file failed. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Process of creating new styles file failed. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: Replacing new theme styles file failed. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Replacing new theme styles file failed. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: The color palette update failed. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: The color palette update failed. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: Use same header logo is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Use same header logo is unavailable.

trans-unit.source: The image format is not recognized, allowed formats are: %formats%.
trans-unit.target: The image format is not recognized, allowed formats are: %formats%.

trans-unit.source: The image format is not recognized, allowed format is: .%format%.
trans-unit.target: The image format is not recognized, allowed format is: .%format%.

trans-unit.source: The format is invalid, allowed formats are %allowed_formats%.
trans-unit.target: The format is invalid, allowed formats are %allowed_formats%.

trans-unit.source: The logo destination is invalid. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: The logo destination is invalid. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: The logo upload failed. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: The logo upload failed. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: The file is too large (limit of %size% bytes).
trans-unit.target: The file is too large (limit of %size% bytes).

trans-unit.source: Failed to initialize image creation. PHP GD extension missing.
trans-unit.target: Failed to initialize image creation. PHP GD extension missing.

trans-unit.source: Failed convert text to image. Please select different font.
trans-unit.target: Failed convert text to image. Please select different font.

trans-unit.source: This font does not exist. Please choose another font.
trans-unit.target: This font does not exist. Please choose another font.

trans-unit.source: The creation of a temporary directory to store the uploaded font has failed. Please check the user permissions on your system.
trans-unit.target: The creation of a temporary directory to store the uploaded font has failed. Please check the user permissions on your system.

trans-unit.source: Failed to convert text to logo. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Failed to convert text to logo. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: Failed to retrieve font. Please use different font.
trans-unit.target: Failed to retrieve font. Please use different font.

trans-unit.source: The text may not be longer than 64 characters.
trans-unit.target: The text may not be longer than 64 characters.

trans-unit.source: Module upgrade failed. Please try upgrading it through module manager
trans-unit.target: Module upgrade failed. Please try upgrading it through module manager

trans-unit.source: Your module has been successfully upgraded!
trans-unit.target: Your module has been successfully upgraded!

trans-unit.source: Always check the final result on your store as it may differ from the preview, depending on your theme.
trans-unit.target: Always check the final result on your store as it may differ from the preview, depending on your theme.

trans-unit.source: Save the use of header logo for %form%
trans-unit.target: Save the use of header logo for %form%

trans-unit.source: The header logo appears on all pages of your store.
trans-unit.target: The header logo appears on all pages of your store.

trans-unit.source: The recommended size for the default theme: height 40 px and width 200 px.
trans-unit.target: The recommended size for the default theme: height 40 px and width 200 px.

trans-unit.source: Unless you change your mind, the same logo will be used on your emails and invoices.
trans-unit.target: Unless you change your mind, the same logo will be used on your emails and invoices.

trans-unit.source: The favicon is a small icon that appears on the left in the address bar, tabs, favorites, etc.
trans-unit.target: The favicon is a small icon that appears on the left in the address bar, tabs, favorites, etc.

trans-unit.source: Create your own with our [1]favicon generator[/1] to reinforce your brand image.
trans-unit.target: Create your own with our [1]favicon generator[/1] to reinforce your brand image.

trans-unit.source: The %s% theme has just been added.
trans-unit.target: The %s% theme has just been added.

trans-unit.source: You are about to delete the %theme% theme. This action is irreversible.
trans-unit.target: You are about to delete the %theme% theme. This action is irreversible.

trans-unit.source: This field shows the ZIP files present in the "/themes" folder.
trans-unit.target: This field shows the ZIP files present in the "/themes" folder.

trans-unit.source: Browse the files on your computer and select the ZIP file containing your new theme.
trans-unit.target: Browse the files on your computer and select the ZIP file containing your new theme.

trans-unit.source: Your current %currentTheme% theme will be replaced by the %new_theme% theme.
trans-unit.target: Your current %currentTheme% theme will be replaced by the %new_theme% theme.

trans-unit.source: It is important to check the compatibility of your modules with the %new_theme% theme in a test environment.
trans-unit.target: It is important to check the compatibility of your modules with the %new_theme% theme in a test environment.

trans-unit.source: Specify the full URL of the ZIP file that contains your new theme. For example, "http://example.com/files/theme.zip".
trans-unit.target: Specify the full URL of the ZIP file that contains your new theme. For example, "http://example.com/files/theme.zip".

trans-unit.source: The theme defines the appearance of your site.
trans-unit.target: The theme defines the appearance of your site.

trans-unit.source: To customize the theme, click on the "Customize" button and filter the modules by the "Design & Navigation" category if you use the Classic theme.
trans-unit.target: To customize the theme, click on the "Customize" button and filter the modules by the "Design & Navigation" category if you use the Classic theme.

trans-unit.source: Choose the default Classic theme for a simple and minimalist store.
trans-unit.target: Choose the default Classic theme for a simple and minimalist store.

trans-unit.source: You can choose other themes with more advanced customization from this list of themes.
trans-unit.target: You can choose other themes with more advanced customization from this list of themes.

trans-unit.source: Enter a valid [1]hex code[/1] or use the color picker.
trans-unit.target: Enter a valid [1]hex code[/1] or use the color picker.

trans-unit.source: The color used for primary elements (example: buttons and links).
trans-unit.target: The color used for primary elements (example: buttons and links).

trans-unit.source: The color used for the discount elements (examples: promo stickers, discounted prices on the product page).
trans-unit.target: The color used for the discount elements (examples: promo stickers, discounted prices on the product page).

trans-unit.source: The color used for text elements (examples: titles, filters on category pages, prices, login button).
trans-unit.target: The color used for text elements (examples: titles, filters on category pages, prices, login button).

trans-unit.source: The color palette defines the colors of buttons, links, discount inserts, discounted prices, and texts.
trans-unit.target: The color palette defines the colors of buttons, links, discount inserts, discounted prices, and texts.

trans-unit.source: Customize the colors by writing the [1]hex color code[/1] or by using the color picker.
trans-unit.target: Customize the colors by writing the [1]hex color code[/1] or by using the color picker.

trans-unit.source: This page allows you to change default colors for the Classic theme.
trans-unit.target: This page allows you to change default colors for the Classic theme.

trans-unit.source: [1]Select[/1] a file or drag and drop
trans-unit.target: [1]Select[/1] a file or drag and drop

trans-unit.source: We have improved the Design section of your back office
trans-unit.target: We have improved the Design section of your back office

trans-unit.source: Enjoy a better experience and benefit from the latest improvements. Your settings and data will be preserved.
trans-unit.target: Enjoy a better experience and benefit from the latest improvements. Your settings and data will be preserved.
